title: Trump Or No Trump, The US Solar Industry Had A $22.2 Billion Year In 2025
description:
The US solar industry experienced a slowdown in growth during 2025, but investor activity still contributed $22.2 billion to the domestic economy.

The post Trump Or No Trump, The US Solar Industry Had A $22.2 Billion Year In 2025 appeared first on CleanTechnica.
